May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
He's the only multi-carry in the set that isn't tied to a specific keyword, isn't he? Soldier, Spy, and even Assassin are relatively likely pulls in Sealed for the Leadership, too. He can also make an attack better than most taxis, and the Stealth helps. That said, I wish he had just one extra thing to put him over the top. The Masters of Evil TA, now that it's close-combat Hydra, would have made him appealing for alley-ooping with common Captain America or similar... But a good cheap taxi is a useful Sealed pull nonetheless.
